data.text: @cityofwinnipeg Thank you for putting them in libraries instead of liquor stores. Appreciate you.

@anasviefes @cityofwinnipeg I think theyâ€™re just saying to not show up at the library if you are actively sick and seeking a test. Go to a testing site if you are sick because they have the proper precautions in place.

@cityofwinnipeg IF the person is asymptomatic and will come out postive, they are just spreading the virus going at the library. If a husband or a wife is asymptomatic, the kit should be given two test kit even if it will come out negative both of them should be tested.
Please consult operating hours before visiting: https://t.co/zJZvzTazPK
